title: Must Watch: Gravel meets trials in Le Tour de Farm with Pat Smage
content:
As a 12x U.S. National Trials Champion, Pat Smage can ride just about everything. But his latest video is more than just mind-bending moves on a bike. It has that too, but more importantly, “Le Tour de Farm” is a tribute to his grandparents and their farm which was instrumental in developing his success on

The post Must Watch: Gravel meets trials in Le Tour de Farm with Pat Smage appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
